text: Edward Herbert (1767 - 1814) was Archdeacon of Aghadoe from 1798 until his death."Fasti Ecclesiae Hibernicae: The succession of the prelates Volume 1" Cotton,H. p454 Dublin, Hodges & Smith, 1848-1878 Herbert was educated at Trinity College, DublinAlumni Dublinenses Burtchaell,G.D/Sadlier,T.U p391: Dublin, Alex Thom and Co, 1935 He held incumbencies at Killarney, Killorglin, Knockane, Lyons and Kill, County Kildare. He was Chancellor of Christ Church Cathedral, Dublin from 1809"Fasti Ecclesiae Hibernicae: The succession of the prelates Volume 2" Cotton,H. p59 Dublin, Hodges & Smith, 1848-1878 until his death. ==References== Category:Alumni of Trinity College Dublin Category:Archdeacons of Aghadoe Category:1814 deaths Category:1767 births
title: Edward Herbert (priest)
